name: vscode-javascript-booster
description: Boost your productivity with advanced JavaScript refactorings and commands
author: Stepan Burguchev <me@sburg.net>

scripts.test: npm run compile:dev && npm run test:server:coverage && npm run test:client
scripts.compile:dev: npm run compile:server:dev && npm run compile:client:dev
scripts.compile:prod: npm run compile:server:prod && npm run compile:client:prod
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run compile:prod && cd client && vsce package
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.version: cd client && npm version $npm_package_version && git add -A
